item.title: pasta - stupid simple pastebin service
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: pasta is a stupid simple pastebin service for self-hosting. I started this project months ago because I was missing an easy, simple and no pain self-hosting solution. This is what pasta is about. You just throw a file at it via it’s archaic web interface, a simple POST request or with its stupid simple CLI tool:
